rules.name: Component Naming Convention
rules.message: React components should use PascalCase and .jsx or .js extension

rules.name: Hook Naming Convention
rules.message: Custom hooks should start with 'use' and use PascalCase

rules.name: Modal Component Naming
rules.message: Modal components should end with 'Modal'

rules.name: Layout Component Naming
rules.message: Layout components should end with 'Layout'

rules.name: Card Component Naming
rules.message: Card components should end with 'Card'

rules.name: Form Component Naming
rules.message: Form components should end with 'Form'

rules.name: Redux Slice Naming
rules.message: Redux slices should end with 'Slice.js'

rules.name: Utility Function Naming
rules.message: Utility functions should use camelCase

rules.name: Component Import Order
rules.message: Third-party imports should be grouped together

rules.name: Protected Route Pattern
rules.message: Protected routes should use withAuth HOC

rules.name: Form Validation Schema
rules.message: Form validation should use Zod schemas

rules.name: React Query Hook Pattern
rules.message: React Query hooks should use PascalCase for query keys

rules.name: Redux Action Pattern
rules.message: Redux slices should use createSlice from @reduxjs/toolkit

rules.name: Tailwind Class Pattern
rules.message: Use tw-merge for conditional Tailwind classes

rules.name: Component Props Type
rules.message: Use PropTypes for component prop validation

rules.name: API Call Pattern
rules.message: API endpoints should use PascalCase

rules.name: Date Handling Pattern
rules.message: Use date-fns for date manipulation

rules.name: Toast Notification Pattern
rules.message: Use toast notifications for user feedback

rules.name: Animation Pattern
rules.message: Use framer-motion for animations

rules.name: Icon Import Pattern
rules.message: Use lucide-react for icons
